data.comment: The big names in today's match at Fortuna Sittard Stadion have now been confirmed.
Today's referee, Martin Van den Kerkhof, has blown to start the match.
Free kick for Sittard in their own half.
Throw-in for Zwolle close to the penalty box.
Martin Van den Kerkhof awards Sittard a goal kick.
Martin Van den Kerkhof signals a free kick to Zwolle in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Sittard awarded a free kick in their own half.
Zwolle to take a throw-in in Sittard territory.
Zwolle are pushing forward but Vito Van Crooij's finish is wide of the goal.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Sittard-Geleen.
Sittard have a goal kick.
Martin Van den Kerkhof signals a free kick to Sittard.
Goal kick for Sittard at Fortuna Sittard Stadion.
Ball goes out of play for a Sittard goal kick.
Free kick for Zwolle in their own half.
Nikolai Frederiksen for Sittard has been booked by Martin Van den Kerkhof and receives a first yellow card.
Free kick for Sittard in the half of Zwolle.
Sittard have been awarded a corner by Martin Van den Kerkhof.
Can Zwolle get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Sittard's half?
Sittard needs to be cautious. Zwolle have an attacking throw-in.
Corner awarded to Zwolle.
Thomas Lam of Zwolle gets in a strike, but is off target.
Sittard have a goal kick.
Sittard awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Sittard's Amadou Ciss looks ok and returns to the pitch.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Amadou Ciss.
At Fortuna Sittard Stadion, Sittard are penalized for being offside.
Ball goes out of play for a Zwolle goal kick.
In Sittard-Geleen Zwolle attack through Pelle Clement. The finish is off target, however.
Martin Van den Kerkhof awards Sittard a goal kick.
Free kick Sittard.
Ball safe as Zwolle is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In Sittard-Geleen a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Goal kick for Zwolle at Fortuna Sittard Stadion.
Free kick Zwolle.
Martin Van den Kerkhof signals a free kick to Zwolle.
Zwolle pushes forward through Gustavo Hamer, whose finish on goal is saved.
Zwolle have a dangerous throw-in.
Throw-in for Sittard at Fortuna Sittard Stadion.
Zwolle's Kenneth Paal misses with an attempt on goal.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Sittard-Geleen.
Can Sittard capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Zwolle's half?
Zwolle have a goal kick.
Martin Van den Kerkhof signals a free kick to Sittard in their own half.
Sittard are coming forward and Rasmus Karjalainen gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Zwolle goal kick.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Sittard-Geleen.
Martin Van den Kerkhof signals a Zwolle throw-in in Sittard's half.
Throw-in for Sittard in the half of Zwolle.
Throw-in Zwolle.
Free kick for Sittard in the half of Zwolle.
At Fortuna Sittard Stadion, Jarni Koorman has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Zwolle awarded a free kick in their own half.
Zwolle's Mike Van Duinen gets in a shot on goal at Fortuna Sittard Stadion. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Zwolle have been awarded a corner by Martin Van den Kerkhof.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Thomas Lam for Zwolle who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Zwolle's Thomas Lam is back in action after a slight knock.
Martin Van den Kerkhof awards the away team a throw-in.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
1 minutes will be added to the 1st half in Sittard-Geleen.
In Sittard-Geleen a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Martin Van den Kerkhof blows to end the first-half.
The second-half is underway in Sittard-Geleen.
Sjors Ultee is making the team's first substitution at Fortuna Sittard Stadion with Tesfaldet Tekie replacing Nikolai Frederiksen.
Martin Van den Kerkhof signals a free kick to Zwolle in their own half.
Corner awarded to Zwolle.
Free kick for Sittard in the half of Zwolle.
Throw-in for Sittard in their own half.
Martin Van den Kerkhof signals a free kick to Sittard.
Can Zwolle get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Sittard's half?
Martin Van den Kerkhof awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Zwolle in the half of Sittard.
In Sittard-Geleen a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Sittard's Tesfaldet Tekie breaks free at Fortuna Sittard Stadion. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Goal kick for Zwolle at Fortuna Sittard Stadion.
Martin Van den Kerkhof signals a Zwolle throw-in in Sittard's half.
Martin Van den Kerkhof awards Sittard a goal kick.
Sittard have been awarded a corner by Martin Van den Kerkhof.
Free kick for Zwolle in their own half.
Zwolle to take a throw-in in Sittard territory.
The away team replace Vito Van Crooij with Reza Ghoochannejhad.
Throw-in high up the field for Sittard in Sittard-Geleen.
Throw-in for Zwolle at Fortuna Sittard Stadion.
Sittard's Mark Diemers gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Zwolle goal kick.
Corner awarded to Sittard.
Martin Van den Kerkhof signals a Sittard throw-in in Zwolle's half.
Sittard are pushing forward but Llazaros Rota's finish is wide of the goal.
Goal kick for Zwolle at Fortuna Sittard Stadion.
Zwolle to take a throw-in in Sittard territory.
Sittard push forward at Fortuna Sittard Stadion and Mark Diemers gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Zwolle defence.
Corner awarded to Sittard.
Throw-in for Sittard in the half of Zwolle.
Zwolle awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Yuta Nakayama is on a sub for Jarni Koorman for Zwolle.
Jorrit Smeets (Sittard) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
George Cox scores to make it 1-0 at Fortuna Sittard Stadion.
Sittard awarded a free kick in their own half.
Bassala Sambou is replacing Rasmus Karjalainen for Sittard at Fortuna Sittard Stadion.
Sittard are in shooting range from this free kick.
Free kick Sittard.

Sittard's Bassala Sambou misses with an attempt on goal.

A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Sittard in the half of Zwolle.
Lennart Thy is replacing Mike Van Duinen for the away team.
Martin Van den Kerkhof signals a Sittard throw-in in Zwolle's half.
Gustavo Hamer is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Gustavo Hamer for Zwolle is back on the field again.
Martin Van den Kerkhof signals a free kick to Sittard.
Sittard make their third substitution with Martin Angha replacing Amadou Ciss.
Throw-in for Zwolle in their own half.
Gustavo Hamer (Zwolle) gets a yellow card.
Zwolle have been awarded a corner by Martin Van den Kerkhof.
[62] ([63]) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.

An attacking Zwolle player has been brought down in the area ... It's a penalty!
Throw-in Sittard.
Can Sittard get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Zwolle's half?
5 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Throw-in for Sittard at Fortuna Sittard Stadion.
Throw-in Sittard.
Zwolle awarded a free kick in their own half.
Sittard will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Zwolle.
Martin Van den Kerkhof signals a free kick to Zwolle just outside Sittard's area.
Gustavo Hamer of Zwolle gets in a strike, but is off target.
Martin Van den Kerkhof awards Sittard a goal kick.
The match has come to a close in Sittard-Geleen. The final score is 1-1.
Lennart Thy scores from the spot to level the match at 1-1.
